00044 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00045 #  include "config.h"
00046 #endif // HAVE_CONFIG_H
00047 
00048 #include <stdio.h>
00049 #include <stdlib.h>
00050 #include <time.h>
00051 #include <unistd.h>
00052 
00053 #include <nfc/nfc.h>
00054 
00055 #include "utils/nfc-utils.h"
00056 #include "libnfc/chips/pn53x.h"
00057 
00058 #define MAX_FRAME_LEN 264
00059 #define TIMEOUT 60              // secs.
00060 
00061 static void
00062 wait_one_minute(void)
00063 {
00064   int     secs = 0;
00065 
00066   printf("|");
00067   fflush(stdout);
00068 
00069   while (secs < TIMEOUT) {
00070     sleep(1);
00071     secs++;
00072     printf(".");
00073     fflush(stdout);
00074   }
00075 
00076   printf("|\n");
00077 }
00078 
00079 int
00080 main(int argc, const char *argv[])
00081 {
00082   (void) argc;
00083   (void) argv;
00084 
00085   nfc_context *context;
00086   nfc_init(&context);
00087   if (context == NULL) {
00088     ERR("Unable to init libnfc (malloc)");
00089     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00090   }
00091 
00092   // Display libnfc version
00093   const char *acLibnfcVersion = nfc_version();
00094   printf("%s uses libnfc %s\n", argv[0], acLibnfcVersion);
00095 
00096   // Open using the first available NFC device
00097   nfc_device *pnd;
00098   pnd = nfc_open(context, NULL);
00099 
00100   if (pnd == NULL) {
00101     ERR("%s", "Unable to open NFC device.");
00102     nfc_exit(context);
00103     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00104   }
00105 
00106   printf("NFC device: %s opened\n", nfc_device_get_name(pnd));
00107 
00108   // Print the example's menu
00109   printf("\nSelect the communication mode:\n");
00110   printf("[1] Virtual card mode.\n");
00111   printf("[2] Wired card mode.\n");
00112   printf("[3] Dual card mode.\n");
00113   printf(">> ");
00114 
00115   // Take user's choice
00116   char    input = getchar();
00117   printf("\n");
00118   if ((input < '1') || (input > '3')) {
00119     ERR("%s", "Invalid selection.");
00120     nfc_close(pnd);
00121     nfc_exit(context);
00122     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00123   }
00124 
00125   /*
00126    * '1' -> "Virtual mode" (0x02)
00127    * '2' -> "Wired card" (0x03)
00128    * '3' -> "Dual card" (0x04)
00129    */
00130   int iMode = input - '0' + 0x01;
00131   pn532_sam_mode mode = iMode;
00132 
00133   // Connect with the SAM
00134 
00135   switch (mode) {
00136     case PSM_VIRTUAL_CARD: {
00137       // FIXME Its a private pn53x function
00138       if (pn532_SAMConfiguration(pnd, mode, 0) < 0) {
00139         nfc_perror(pnd, "pn53x_SAMConfiguration");
00140         nfc_close(pnd);
00141         nfc_exit(context);
00142         exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00143       }
00144       printf("Now the SAM is readable for 1 minute from an external reader.\n");
00145       wait_one_minute();
00146     }
00147     break;
00148 
00149     case PSM_WIRED_CARD: {
00150       // Set opened NFC device to initiator mode
00151       if (nfc_initiator_init_secure_element(pnd) < 0) {
00152         nfc_perror(pnd, "nfc_initiator_init_secure_element");
00153         nfc_close(pnd);
00154         nfc_exit(context);
00155         exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00156       }
00157 
00158       // Let the reader only try once to find a tag
00159       if (nfc_device_set_property_bool(pnd, NP_INFINITE_SELECT, false) < 0) {
00160         nfc_perror(pnd, "nfc_device_set_property_bool");
00161         nfc_close(pnd);
00162         nfc_exit(context);
00163         exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00164       }
00165       // Read the SAM's info
00166       const nfc_modulation nmSAM = {
00167         .nmt = NMT_ISO14443A,
00168         .nbr = NBR_106,
00169       };
00170       nfc_target nt;
00171 
00172       int res;
00173       if ((res = nfc_initiator_select_passive_target(pnd, nmSAM, NULL, 0, &nt)) < 0) {
00174         nfc_perror(pnd, "nfc_initiator_select_passive_target");
00175         nfc_close(pnd);
00176         nfc_exit(context);
00177         exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00178       } else if (res == 0) {
00179         ERR("No SAM found.");
00180         nfc_close(pnd);
00181         nfc_exit(context);
00182         exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00183       } else if (res == 1) {
00184         printf("The following ISO14443A tag (SAM) was found:\n");
00185         print_nfc_target(&nt, true);
00186       } else {
00187         ERR("%s", "More than one ISO14442 tag found as SAM.");
00188         nfc_close(pnd);
00189         nfc_exit(context);
00190         exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00191       }
00192     }
00193     break;
00194 
00195     case PSM_DUAL_CARD: {
00196       // FIXME Its a private pn53x function
00197       if (pn532_SAMConfiguration(pnd, mode, 0) < 0) {
00198         nfc_perror(pnd, "pn53x_SAMConfiguration");
00199         nfc_close(pnd);
00200         nfc_exit(context);
00201         exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00202       }
00203       uint8_t  abtRx[MAX_FRAME_LEN];
00204 
00205       nfc_target nt = {
00206         .nm = {
00207           .nmt = NMT_ISO14443A,
00208           .nbr = NBR_UNDEFINED,
00209         },
00210         .nti = {
00211           .nai = {
00212             .abtAtqa = { 0x04, 0x00 },
00213             .abtUid = { 0x08, 0xad, 0xbe, 0xef },
00214             .btSak = 0x20,
00215             .szUidLen = 4,
00216             .szAtsLen = 0,
00217           },
00218         },
00219       };
00220       printf("Now both, NFC device (configured as target) and SAM are readables from an external NFC initiator.\n");
00221       printf("Please note that NFC device (configured as target) stay in target mode until it receive RATS, ATR_REQ or proprietary command.\n");
00222       if (nfc_target_init(pnd, &nt, abtRx, sizeof(abtRx), 0) < 0) {
00223         nfc_perror(pnd, "nfc_target_init");
00224         nfc_close(pnd);
00225         nfc_exit(context);
00226         exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00227       }
00228       // wait_one_minute ();
00229     }
00230     break;
00231     case PSM_NORMAL:
00232       // This should not happend... nothing to do.
00233       break;
00234   }
00235 
00236   // Disconnect from the SAM
00237   pn532_SAMConfiguration(pnd, PSM_NORMAL, -1);
00238 
00239   // Close NFC device
00240   nfc_close(pnd);
00241   nfc_exit(context);
00242   exit(EXIT_SUCCESS);
00243 }
Generated on Fri Apr 5 2013 16:09:20 for libnfc by   1.7.6.1
